data.title: Blaise Pascal's and Michel de Montaigne's Concept of Diversion: A Comparative Study
data.meta_description: Blaise Pascal’s and Michel de Montaigne’s Concept of Diversion: A Comparative Study - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document is a thesis submitted by Sem. Wilson Aringoy Jerusalem to San Carlos Seminary College in partial fulfillment of the requirements for a Bachelor of Arts degree in Philosophy. The thesis examines the concepts of diversion put forth by Blaise Pascal and Michel de Montaigne through a comparative study. It contains an acknowledgements section, table of contents, five chapters discussing the lives and works of Pascal and Montaigne, their individual concepts of diversion, a comparison of their concepts, and a conclusion with recommendations. The thesis was approved by a panel of examiners in February 2015 with a grade of 1.6.
data.text: Blaise Pascal's and Michel de Montaigne's Concept of Diversion: A Comparative Study
